content.question: Levi walks at a constant rate of <math alttext="2.75"><mn>2.75</mn></math> miles per hour, and Jaden walks a a constant rate of <math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math> miles per hour. They start from the same starting point and walk in different directions for exactly <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math> hour. As a result, what is the angle between their directions if after the hour they are <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math> mile apart?

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
